description.fr:
{%FightTurnEnded} {PA_RESvalue:r,+}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Se {#TRANSFORMATION[Transforme]} en {Summoning:614} s'il a au moins {PA_RESvalue:r2}.
\---
{%Death} Le {%Family_Chafer_Name} allié ayant le plus de {%pv} se {#TRANSFORMATION[Transforme]!} en {Summoning:794!}. Consomme la {%reserve}.
description.en:
{%FightTurnEnded} {PA_RESvalue:r,+}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} {#TRANSFORMATION[Turns]} into the {Summoning:614} if he has at least {PA_RESvalue:r2}.
\---
{%Death} The allied {%Family_Chafer_Name} with the most {%pv} {#TRANSFORMATION[turns]!} into the {Summoning:794!}. Consumes the {%reserve}.
description.es:
{%FightTurnEnded} {PA_RESvalue:r,+}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} Se {#TRANSFORMATION[transforma]} en {Summoning:614} si tiene al menos {PA_RESvalue:r2}.
\---
{%Death} El {%Family_Chafer_Name} aliado que tenga más {%pv} se {#TRANSFORMATION[transforma]!} en {Summoning:794!}. Consume la {%reserve}.
description.de:
{%FightTurnEnded} {PA_RESvalue:r,+}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} {#TRANSFORMATION[Verwandelt]} sich in {Summoning:614}, wenn er mindestens {PA_RESvalue:r2} hat.
\---
{%Death} Der verbündete {%Family_Chafer_Name} mit den meisten {%pv} {#TRANSFORMATION[verwandelt]!} sich in einen {Summoning:794!}. Verbraucht die {%reserve}.
description.pt:
{%FightTurnEnded} {PA_RESvalue:r,+}.
\---
{%FightTurnStarted} {#TRANSFORMATION[Transforma-se]} em {Summoning:614} se ele tiver {PA_RESvalue:r2} ou mais.
\---
{%Death} O {%Family_Chafer_Name} aliado que tiver mais {%pv} se {#TRANSFORMATION[transforma]!} em {Summoning:794!}. Consome a {%reserve}.
